class littlefish.core.evolution.UniformMutation(value_range, dtype)[source]¶

Bases: object

definition of a single mutation of a single value, based on a uniform distribution of a value range. uses builtin random module

get_dtype()[source]¶
get_value()[source]¶

if self._dtype is ‘int’: uses random.randint() function if self._dtype is ‘float’: uses random.uniform() function

Returns:a random value follow a uniform distribution with a range defined by self._value_range, including the start but excluding the end
get_value_range()[source]¶
littlefish.core.evolution.choose_index_1d(indices, mutation_rate)[source]¶

randomly chooses a subset of indices from a list of indices based on the mutation_rate

Parameters:
  • indices – list of unsigned integers, all indices to choose from
  • mutation_rate – float, [0., 1.]
Returns:

list of unsigned integers, a list of subset of the indices
littlefish.core.evolution.choose_index_2d(indices0, indices1, mutation_rate)[source]¶

randomly choose a subset of index pairs from a 2d grid based on the mutation rates

Parameters:
  • indices0 – 1d seq, list of indices along axis 0 (rows)
  • indices1 – 1d seq, list of indices along axis 1 (columns)
  • mutation_rate – float, [0., 1.]
Returns:

list of index pairs, each pair contains two elements [index0, index1] representing the coordinates of a randomly chosen location
littlefish.core.evolution.get_offspring_num(mother_life_spans, hard_thr, soft_thr, reproducing_rate=0.0002)[source]¶

given a list of mother life spans in multiple simulations, return a number representing how many offsprings it will produce.

Parameters:
  • mother_life_spans – list of non-negative int, mother’s life spans in multiple simulation
  • hard_thr – non-negative int, mother will have chance to reproduce only if all life spans in mother_life_spans are no less than this threshold
  • soft_thr – non-negative int, each life span in mother_life_spans longer than this threshold will be used to calculated offspring number
  • reproducing_rate – positive float, this rate time the life spans that exceed soft_thr x soft_thr_ratio will be returned
Returns:

non-negative int, number of offsprings the mother fish wil produce
